name: Enigma Dimensional - Proyect
description:
A First-person Adventure Game, in which I participate in part of the entire development together with 2 other people, I do programming, modeling, texturing and design, mix puzzles that will blow your head off, and a stealth and time trial theme that add more pressure to the player.

The game is about a detective who wants to investigate a mob boss and find evidence of some murders to catch him. For this, you can use the unique ability of the character that allows you to see things that were not here before. 

Can you find them all?
